content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite a catch, wouldn't you agree? Now, about the rental price, I think €1,000 a month would be more than fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the central location and the modern construction of the apartment, I must carefully consider my budget. After weighing my options, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price exceeds my means significantly.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam Abbasi. It's not my problem if your budget is insufficient. Let's conclude this negotiation, shall we? 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
